Term.Name: urn:dvb:broadcast:ird:audio:MPEG-1_and_MPEG-2_backwards_compatible
Term.Definition: MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 backwards compatible audio as defined in clause 6.1 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Name: urn:dvb:broadcast:ird:audio:AC-3_and_enhanced_AC-3
Term.Definition: AC-3 and enhanced AC-3 audio as defined in clause 6.2 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Name: urn:dvb:broadcast:ird:audio:DTS
Term.Definition: DTS audio as defined in clause 6.3 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Name: urn:dvb:broadcast:ird:audio:MPEG-4_AAC_family
Term.Definition: MPEG-4 AAC, MPEG-4 HE AAC and MPEG-4 HE AAC v2 audio as defined in clause 6.4 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Name: urn:dvb:broadcast:ird:audio:AC-4_channel_based
Term.Definition: AC-4 channel based audio as defined in clause 6.6 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Name: urn:dvb:broadcast:ird:audio:AC-4_channel_based_immersive_personalized
Term.Definition: AC-4 for channel-based, immersive and personalized audio as defined in clause 6.7 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Name: urn:dvb:broadcast:ird:audio:MPEG-H
Term.Definition: MPEG-H audio as defined in clause 6.8 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Definition: MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 backwards compatible audio as defined in clause 6.1 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Definition: AC-3 and enhanced AC-3 audio as defined in clause 6.2 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Definition: DTS audio as defined in clause 6.3 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Definition: AC-4 channel based audio as defined in clause 6.6 of ETSI TS 101 154

Term.Definition: AC-4 for channel-based, immersive and personalized audio as defined in clause 6.7 of ETSI TS 101 154
